turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! Hey, Linda, thanks for answering. Do you think you could do me favor? I'm heading into the city and would like to pick a pizza up at Savage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'd like a pizza order for pick up, from the Savage off Moreland?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, Moreland is fine. Could you tell me if they're running any specials on a single pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, let me just have a look here. I don't see any specials for the pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Dang, that sucks. Okay, how much is their Chicken Florentine pizza? Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let's see, looks like a large Chicken Florentine pizza is $19.75

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know it has onions on it, but are they the yellow or red?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yellow. Would you like a different kind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask for red instead of the yellow?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All my payment information should be saved.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it's here. Okay, so I have one large Chicken Florentine, red instead of yellow onions pizza, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, about how long before it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me just submit the information....okay, says it will be done in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! Thank you so much, Linda!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, your receipt should be sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, I've just received it. I appreciate you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, any time!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have a great day, and I'll see you at the office in the morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely, enjoy your pizza!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again. Good-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good-bye
